name: protective-pads
effect: Held: Prevents side effects of contact moves used on the holder.
short_effect: Held: Prevents side effects of contact moves used on the holder.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.
